```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


# Load in Data

```{r}
soccer <- read_delim("posts/Pro Soccer Players 2022-2023/2022-2023 Football Player Stats.csv", delim=";")
```

# Explore the Data

## Top Five scorers in 2022-2023 Season

```{r}
soccer %>%
  select(Player, Nation, Pos, Squad, Comp, Goals) %>%
  arrange(desc(Goals)) %>%
  head() %>% pander::pander()
```


## Goals by Position

```{r}
soccer %>%
  group_by(Pos) %>%
  summarise(Total_Goals = sum(Goals)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Total_Goals)) %>% pander::pander()
```

## Goals by League

```{r}
soccer %>%
  group_by(Comp) %>%
  summarise(Total_Goals = sum(Goals)) %>%
  arrange(desc(Total_Goals)) %>% pander::pander()
```
